title: Get Susanna Reid's and Charlotte Hawkins' high street dresses from GMB here
text:
Get the biggest Weekly Fashion stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Good Morning Britain ladies, Susanna Reid and Charlotte Hawkins, graced our screens this morning in high street brand Closet London.

The two leading ladies, who often opt for dresses from a number of high street brands, both went for styles from online retailer Closet London this morning.

Susanna Reid went for a bold floral number, with a delicate front drape in a stretchy fabric.

Reid paired her floral frock with neutral suede court shoes, letting her dress be the main focus of her look today.

Charlotte Hawkins instead went for a vibrant fuchsia pink shirt dress that pleated out at the skirt, with pearl front buttons.

Hawkins completed her pretty pink look with pastel pink bow heels from Ted Baker.

So if you fancy a touch of the presenters' style, shop the links here...

Multi Floral Draped Front Wrap Dress as seen on Susanna

Happy shopping!
description: Both Susanna Reid and Charlotte Hawkins have opted for affordable brand Closet London for their dresses today...
